meta.title: Custom Software Solutions for Healthcare
meta.description: This is Codex Software landing page

articleWithImageAndText.title: Services
articleWithImageAndText.subtitle: Get a working solution to validate your idea, affordably.
articleWithImageAndText.text: We are a team of experienced software developers who can help you reduce costs, boost staff efficiency, improve interoperability, and revitalise your healthcare organisation.

textBoxes.title: Software MVP Development
textBoxes.subtitle: Bring the app to market as fast as possible
textBoxes.text: A team of skilled UX experts, product engineers, and business analysts will help you prototype, test, and validate your ideas quickly and efficiently.

textBoxes.title: Software Evolution
textBoxes.subtitle: Enhance and extend your product at any stage
textBoxes.text: Hire a full-service engineering team to improve design, usability, performance, scalability and security of an existing software product, or add new product features.

textBoxes.title: Software Modernisation
textBoxes.subtitle: Revitalise your legacy healthcare systems
textBoxes.text: Receive full range of services to turn outdated software into a modern solution with a better user experience, lower maintenance costs, and extended functionality.

list.title: Reduce development costs
list.text: High implementation and maintenance costs of out-of-box healthcare software, preventing smaller institutions and companies from adopting modern technologies.

list.title: Cut spending on training
list.text: Steep learning curve and high user adoption costs, resulting in additional spending on training and overcoming resistance to changes within the organisation.

list.title: Get rid of siloed healthcare data
list.text: Storing healthcare data in separate non- or badly interoperable systems causes issues in tracking and sharing patient information and leads to subpar care coordination.

list.title: Fix security vulnerabilities
list.text: Sensitive medical data should be protected by all means necessary, including infrastructure setup, data encryption, access control, among others.

list.title: Reduce human factor
list.text: Complex processes that involve multiple manual operations put healthcare service providers at risk of extremely costly mistakes.

list.title: Improve patient care and engagement
list.text: Collect and store patient data, track treatment plans, provide reminders for appointments and medications, and simplify access to healthcare for people regardless of their location or socioeconomic status.

list.title: Enhance Patient Safety
list.text: Move incident and risk management from paper files to digital workflows. Collect, share, analyse and visualise patient data to react to incidents timely and adequately, assess and prevent risks, and enable continuous evolution of care delivery.

list.title: Boost organisational efficiency
list.text: Automate manual processes, such as scheduling appointments, processing insurance claims, and ordering medications. Harness the power of Artificial Intelligence technologies to free up staff time and focus on providing direct patient care.

list.title: Make data-driven decisions
list.text: Collect and analyse large datasets of patient data to identify trends and patterns. This information can be used to improve clinical decision-making and develop new treatments.

imageBoxes.title: Audit Angel
imageBoxes.description: Audit Angel is a healthcare software platform that allows healthcare institutions to audit clinicians, diagnoses and prescribed medications, and improve clinical operations, quality management, risk assessment, and regulatory compliance.

imageBoxes.title: SP Appointment
imageBoxes.description: Codex Software joined the Customer, a foundation trust that runs three major hospitals across Essex, the UK, and several smaller community hospitals, in building an end-to-end solution for the scheduling and tracking of COVID-19 tests. The platform streamlined appointment booking for medical staff, reducing the load on test centres and minimising the waiting time.

imageBoxes.title: ShiftPartner:Bankshift
imageBoxes.description: Codex Software was engaged by technology startup Shift Partner to build Shiftpartner: Bankshift - a platform that allows healthcare institutions to find, employ and replace skilled nurses on demand, enabling flexible and seamless staff management within, and across ICSs.

messageInput.label: Message
messageInput.placeholder: Share your requirements, ask a question, or request a free consultation
